1.0.name: wordpress/reverbnation-widgets
1.0.description: This plugin allows you to embed music players, video players, email collectors, show schedules, and all other ReverbNation widgets on your blog's posts, pages, or sidebars. Embedding is done simply and efficiently, by the use of the [reverbnation] shortcode. You can easily generate the widget code via the Widgets section of your ReverbNation Control Room. Once created, simply paste it anywhere on your blog for instant widget action!
